post.body: I agree. One can't manage personalities (pro coach) when one only allows his personality in the room.
I think your ad looks great, but my humor tends to be edgier so there's no risk of offending me.
Saban is guy I love 2 hate; going back to LSU. There's no question he's a great coach. But I do dislike him (as a coach)
Thanks and I will. I identify with underdogs.
Wow. Didn't realize needing postage meant I don't say hi to people. People I see all day & say hi to will be shocked to learn that
Wait. Was that link supposed to take me to the Kill All The Lawyers website?? What are you trying to say? Just kidding.
You fixed it.
I get a page load error on your link re moms working at home. Is that on my end or yours?
@attcottonbowl That's just wrong. The favored team is supposed to be magnanimous. :)
I need you to tweet two things over and over: "Ole Miss scores" and "Texas Tech lines up to punt again."
I wish you the best regarding your son and his condition.
Last week, my iPhone wrote 2 briefs, argued a motion, and picked up my kids from my mom's. I've really unlocked that phone. :)
Sorry about your news. I wish you the best.
Ole Miss wins the #CottonBowl. Way to go Rebels! Incredible game.
RT @remarkablogger:Want to learn how to effectively optimize your blog for search?SEO-Nomicon drops in 5 days.It will teach you step by step
FYI, my twitter username is @herringtonlaw. It's no longer @brianherrington(which is pers. account now). I think twitter auto re-directs tho
Just bought tweetie app 4 my iPhone. I like multiple account feature. Also, if u email a lot like I do, u may like @xobni. I find it useful.
Taylor v. UPS; good, recent 5th Circuit decision on tolling of class action statute of limitations
RT @BobKraft: Drug Makers Cut Back On Free Goodies for Doctors: In the New York Times today, drug companies are... http://tinyurl.com/8gh2fm
Happy New Year everyone. See you in 2009.
